== Ulliyeri (CT) (627398) ==

Ulliyeri (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 25.89 sq. km. and harbouring 7901 households with total population of 32509 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 440 km. Male population is 15285 and female population is 17224. Scheduled Caste population is 3990 and Scheduled Tribes population is 29. Census Location Code of the town is 627398<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 25 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 5 km.
